manzils.text: Ta xin, mi mu
zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian zhong de jie wen
Yinwei tamen bu xindao, ni huoxu qi de yaosi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yige jixiang, tamen jiu wei ta er fushou tie er
Mei feng you xin de jinian cong zhiren zhu jiang shi tamen, tamen dou beiqi ta
Tamen que yi fouren zhenli, tamen suo chaoxiao de shi de jieju, jiang jianglin tamen
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha da di ma? Wo shi ge zhong youliang de zhiwu zai da dishang fanyan
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Dangri, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa (shuo):“Ni qu jiaohua na bu yi de minzhong
Ji falao de minzhong. Tamen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen fouren wo
yizhi wo fanmen kouchi, suoyi qiu ni paiqian ha lun (yidao qu)
Tamen ceng jia zui yu wo, wo pa tamen shahai wo.”
Zhu shuo:“Jue bu ruci, ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo que shi yu nimen zai yiqi qingting (nimen de bianlun)
Ni lia dao falao nali qu shuo:‘Women que shi quan shijie de zhu de shizhe
Qing ni shifang yiselie de houyi, rang wo lia dai tamen qu.’”
Falao shuo:“Nandao women meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni zi you fuyang chengren, erqie ni zai women jiazhong douliuguo xuduo nian ma
Ni ceng ganle ni suo gan di na jian shi, ni shi wang'en de.”
Ta shuo:“Dangri, wo bu dongshi di ganle na jian shi
Wo jiu weiju nimen, er taobi nimen, suihou, wo de zhu ba zhihui shangci wo, bingqie pai wo wei shizhe
ni zebei wo wang'en, ni suowei de en shi ni ceng nuyi yiselie de houyi.”
Falao shuo:“Quan shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) tiandi wanwu de zhu, ruguo nimen shi quexin zhe.”
Falao dui ta zuoyou de ren shuo:“Nimen zenme bu qingting ne?”
Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
Falao shuo:“Fengming lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe, que shi yige fengzi.”
Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) dongfang he xifang, yiji jie hu dongxi fang zhi jian de zhu, ruguo nimen neng liaojie……”
falao shuo:“Ruguo ni she wo er jing shi bie de shenling, wo shibi shi ni bian cheng yige qiufan.”
Ta shuo:“Jishi wo zhaoshi ni yige mingzheng,(ni reng yao nayang ban) ma?”
Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, ni jiu zhaoshi yige mingzheng ba!”
Ta jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang
ta ba ta de shou chou chulai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xiande bailiang liang de
Falao dui ta zuoyou de guizumen shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi
ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanxian ta he ta gege, bing pai zhengmu yuan dao ge chengshi qu
tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni zheli lai.”
Yiban shushimen zai zhiding de riqi, yi zhiding de shijian bei jihe qilai
Youren dui minzhong shuo:“Nimen jihe qilaile ma
Ruguo shushimen desheng, women huoxu shuncong tamen.”
Shushimen daolai de shihou, tamen dui falao shuo:“Ruguo women desheng, women bi shou baochou ma?”
Ta shuo:“Shi de, zai na shi, nimen bi meng chongxing.”
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen keyi pao xia nimen suoyao pao de dongxi.”
Tamen jiu pao xiale tamen de sheng he zhang, tamen shuo:“Zhi falao de quanli fashi, women biran desheng.”
Mu sa jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran tun xiale tamen suo huanhua de (dashe)
Shushimen jiu bai dao xiaqu
Tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang quan shijie de zhu ──
mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

Falao shuo:“Wo hai meiyou yunxu nimen, nimen jiu xinyang tale ma? Ta bi shi nimen de toumu, ta chuanshou nimen de moshu, nimen bujiu jiu zhidao, wo bi jiaohuzhe kan nimen de shou he jiao, wo bi jiang nimen quanti ding zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Na ye mei shenme, women jiang guiyu women de zhu
Women dique kewang women de zhu she you women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian gui xin de.”§
Wo ceng qishi mu sa (shuo):“Ni zai yejian shuailing wo de zhong pu er luxing, nimen que shi bei zhuigan de.”
Falao paiqian zhengmu zhe dao ge chengshi qu
Ta shuo:“Zhexie ren que shi yi xiao cuo ren
Tamen que shi jinule wo
women que shi jinshen de tuanti.”
Wo jiu shi tamen likai xuduo yuanpu he yuanquan
caibao he gaogui de zhusuo
(Shiqing) shi xiang nayang de. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jicheng ta
Diren zai ri chu shi gan shang tamen
Dang liang jun xiang wang de shihou, mu sa de tonghuomen shuo:“Women shi bi yao bei diren zhui shang.”
Ta shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu tong wo zai yiqi, ta jiang yindao wo.”
Wo qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni yingdang yong ni de shouzhang ji hai.” Hai jiu lie kai, mei yi bu fen, xiang yizuo dashan
Zai nali, wo shi bie de ren zou jin (tamen)
Wo zhengjiu mu sa he ta de quanti huoban
Ranhou, yan sile qiyu de ren
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao zhe
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Ni yingdang dui tamen xuandu yi bo la xin de gushi
Dangri, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi shi qiancheng de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen qidao de shihou, tamen neng tingjian nimen (de qidao ma)
Tamen neng jiang fu yu nimen huo jiang huo yu nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ceng faxian women de zuxian shi nayang zuo de.”
Ta shuo: “Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo chongbai de shi shenme
Nimen zui gu de zuxian chongbai de shi shenme
Tamen que shi wo de choudi, wei quan shijie de zhu ze buran
Ta shi chuangzao wo, ranhou yindao wo de
Ta shi gong wo shi, gong wo yin de
Wo haibing shi, shi ta shi wo quanyu de
Ta jiang shi wo si, ranhou shi wo fuhuo
Wo xiwang ta zai baoying ri she you wo de guoshi
Zhu a! Qiu ni ci wo zhihui, qiu ni shi wo jinru shanren de hanglie
Qiu ni wei wo zai hou ren zhong liu yige ling ming
Qiu ni shi wo wei ji leyuan de jicheng zhe
Qiu ni she you wo de fuqin, ta que shi mi wu de
Qiu ni buyao lingru wo, zai tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri
ji caichan he zisun dou wu biyi zhi ri.”
Wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin lai jian zhenzhu zhe,(de qi biyi)
Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe de fujin
Huo yu jiang bei chenlie zai xie'e zhe de mianqian
Yao xiang tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she zhenzhu er chongbai de, rujin zai nali ne
Tamen neng zhu nimen ne? Haishi tamen neng zizhu ne
Jiang bei touru huo yu zhong de, shi tamen he mi wu zhe
yiji yi bo lie si de yixie budui.”
Tamen zai huo yu zhong zhengbianzhe shuo
“zhi zhenzhu fashi, yiqian, women queshi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong
Dangri, women shi nimen yu quan shijie de zhu tong shou chongbai
Weiyou fanzui zhe shi women mi wu
Suoyi women jue meiyou shuo qing zhe
ye meiyou zhongshi de pengyou
Dan yuan women jiang fanhui chenshi, women jiangyao bian cheng xindao zhe.”
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Nu ha de zongzu ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong nu ha dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you quan shijie de zhu fudan
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo.”§
Tamen shuo:“Yixie zui beijian de ren zhuisui ni, women zen neng xinyang ni ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen zuole shenme shi
Wo de zhu fuze qingsuan tamen, jiaruo nimen zhidao……
wo jue buneng quzhu xinshi
wo zhishi yige zhishuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi (xuanchuan), ni jiu bi zao ruma.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu dique fouren wo
Qiu ni zai wo yu tamen zhi jian jinxing caipan, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he yu wo tong zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta, yiji zai manzai de chuan zhong yu ta gong ji de ren
Suihou wo ni shale qiyu de ren
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bu xindao
Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
A de ren ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong hu de ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen, que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you quan shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen zai gao dishang jianzhu yige jinian wu, yi gong youxi
Nimen sheli yixie baolei, hao xiang nimen jiang yong ju chenshi yiyang
Nimen chengzhi (taren) de shihou, nimen shi hen canku de
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhu, ta yi nimen suo zhidao de shangci nimen
ta shangci nimen shengchu he zisi
yuanpu he yuanquan
Wo dique haipa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao yu fou, zhe duiyu women shi yiyang de
Zhe buguo shi laoshengchangtan bale
Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Sai mo de ren ceng fouren shizhemen
Dangri, tamen de dixiong sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you quan shijie de zhu fudan
Nandao jing rang nimen anxin di zai zhe huanjing zhong me
Zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan
you zhuangjia he juyou xianxi de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu
nimen jingqiao de zao shan zao wu
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Nimen buyao fucong guofen zhe de mingling
tamen zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige shou guhuo de ren
ni zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Ni yingdang zhaoshi yige jixiang, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo, ta ying de yibufen yinliao, nimen ying de mou ding ri de yibufen yinliao
Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, jiang zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa.”
Dan tamen zaile ta, suihou, tamen shen jue huihen
Dan tamen haishi shoule chengfa. Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Lu te de zongzu, ceng fouren shizhe
Dangri, tamen de dixiong lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui quan shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen zenme yao yu zhongren zhong de nanxing jiaojie
er sheqi nimen de zhu suo wei nimen chuangzao de qizi ni? Qishi, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi (gongji), ni bi zao fangzhu.”
Ta shuo:“Wo dique tonghen nimen de xingwei
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiashu, shi women tuoli tamen de xing wei.”
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia
Zhiyou yige lao fu ren chuwai, ta shuyu liu xia de ren
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren
Wo jiangyu qu shang tamen, bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zai, zhen elie
Zai ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Conglin de jumin, ceng fouren shizhe
Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui quan shijie de zhu fudan.§
Nimen yingdang yong zu liang de sheng dou, buyao kekou
Nimen yingdang yi gongping de cheng cheng huowu
Nimen buyao kekou taren suo ying de de caiwu. Nimen buyao zai difang shang weifeizuodai, bainong shifei
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, ta chuangzao nimen he gulao de shidai.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei guhuo de ren
Ni zhishi yige xiang women yiyang de fanren. Women dique renwei ni shi yige shuohuang de
Ni shi tian yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xingwei de.”
Tamen fouren ta, tamen jiu zaoshou yinying zhi ri de xingfa. Na que shi zhongda ri de xingfa
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Zhe “gulanjing” que shi quan shijie de zhu suo qishi de
Na zhongshi de jingshen ba ta jiang shi zai ni de xin shang
yibian ni jinggao zhongren
yi mingbai de alabo yu
Ta que shi zai gu jingdian zhong bei ti daoguo de
Yiselie houyi zhong de xuezhemen zhidao ta, zhe nandao huan bu keyi zuo tamen de yige jixiang ma
Jiaruo wo ba ta jiang shi yige fei alabo ren
er nage ren dui tamen xuandu ta, name, tamen jue bu hui xinyang ta
Wo zheyang shi fanzui de ren chang huai fouren de yinian
Tamen bu xinyang ta, zhidao tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa
Na zhong xingfa jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, huran jianglin tamen
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women jiang meng kuanxian ma?”
Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma
Ni gaosu wo ba, ruguo wo rang tamen xiangshou ruogan nian
ranhou, tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa jianglin tamen
name, tamen yiqian suo xiangshou de, duiyu tamen, jiujing you she me haochu ne
Wo bu huimie renhe chengshi, chufei na chengshi li yi youguo ruogan jinggao zhe
qu jiaohui qizhong de jumin; wo bushi bu yi de
Emomen meiyou daizhe ta jiangxia
Na duiyu tamen ji bushi shiyi de, ye bushi tamen suo neng de
Tamen que shi bei quzhu er bude yu wen de
Chu zhenzhu wai, ni buyao qidao bie de shenling, yimian ni zaoshou xingfa
Ni yingdang jinggao ni de qinqi
Ni duiyu gensui ni di naxie xinshi, yingdang jiayi ci'ai
Ruguo ni de qinqi weikang ni, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo duiyu nimen de xingwei que shi wugan de.”
Ni yingdang xinlai wanneng de zhi ci de zhu
Ni qili de shihou, ta kanjian ni
erqie kanjian ni lu zhong libai de zhongzhong dongzuo
Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Wo gaosu nimen, emomen fu zai shei de shenshang, hao ma
Emomen fu zai mei ge zaoyao de zuiren shenshang
Tamen ce'er er ting, tamen daban shi shuohuang de
Shirenmen bei mi wu zhe suo gensui
Ni buzhidao ma? Tamen zai ge shangu zhong fanghuang
Tamen zhi shang kongtan, bu chong shijian
Wei xindao er xingshan bing duoduo jinian zhenzhu, erqie zai bei qiya zhihou congshi ziwei de ren chuwai, bu yi zhe, jianglai jiu zhidao tamen huode shenme guisu.§
Ta, xin. Zhexie shi “gulanjing”──panbie zhen wei de jingdian ──de jie wen
shi xinzhe de xiangdao he jiayin
Xindao zhe jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi
Buxin houshi zhe, wo que yi wei tamen er zhuangshile tamen de xingwei, gu tamen shi paihuai qitu de
Zhe deng ren shi ying shou yanxing de, tamen zai houshi shi zui kui she de
Ni que yi feng dao cong zhi rui quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”
Dangri, mu sa ceng dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, wo jiang cong you huo di difang dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo na yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
Ta daole nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao ta (shuo):“Zai huo de fujin he sizhou de ren, dou meng fu you. Zansong zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu, chaojue wanwu
Mu sa a! Wo que shi zhenzhu ──wanneng de, zhi rui de zhu
Ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she shi, jiu zhuanlian taobi, bu gan huigu.“Mu sa a! Buyao weiju, shizhemen zai wo zheli, que shi bu weiju de
Ji xing bu yi, ranhou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai, wo (duiyu ta) que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de

Ni bashou charu ni de huai zhong, ranhou, chou chulai ta jiang bailiang liang de, que wu eji. Zhe shi pai ni qu zhaoshi falao he ta de baixing de jiu zhong jixiang zhi yi. Tamen que shi youzui de minzhong.”
Wo de xuduo mingxian jixiang jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Tamen de neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wu de he su lai man, ta lia ceng shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.”
Su lai man ceng jicheng da wu de; ta shuo:“Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.”
Su lai man de dajun ──you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng de ──bei zhaoji dao ta mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de
Dengdao tamen lai daole yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo:“Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun bu zhi bu jue de jianta.”

Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong, qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo:“Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma
Wo biding yanli de chengfa ta, huo tuzai ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.”
Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo:“Wo tongxiaole ni bu tongxiao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni
Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo
Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she zhenzhu er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei, mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bushi zunxun zhengdao de
Tamen bu chongbai zhenzhu ──jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui zhe he biaobai zhe de
Zhen zhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”※§
Ta shuo:“Wo yao kan kan ni jiujing shi chengshi de, haishi shuohuang de
Ni ba wo zhe feng xin dai qu tou gei tamen, ranhou, likai tamen, ni shikan tamen ruhe dafu.”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo jie dao yi feng guizhong de xin
Zhe feng xin que shi su lai man ji lai de, zhe feng xin de neirong que shi ‘feng zhiren zhi ci de zhenzhu zhi ming
Nimen buyao dui wo aoman wu li, nimen yingdang lai guishun wo.’”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Guanyu wo de shi, wang nimen chu ge yijian. Wo conglai bu jueding renhe yi jian shi, zhidao nimen zai wo mianqian.”
Tamen shuo:“Women ji you wuli, you you yongqi. Women dui ni wei ming shi cong, qing ni xiang yi xiang, ni yao women zuo shenme.”
Ta shuo:“Guowangmen mei gong ru yige chengshi, bi pohuai qizhong de jianshe, bi shi qizhong guizu bian cheng jianmin, tamen zhexie ren, ye hui zheyang zuo de
Wo biding yao pai ren song liwu qu gei tamen, ranhou, dengdaizhuo kan shi chen dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”
Dang shizhe daole su lai man de mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme yi caichan lai zizhu wo ne? Zhenzhu suo ci wo de, shengguo ta suo ci nimen de. Buran, nimen wei nimen de liwu er yangyang deyi
Ni zhuan huiqu ba, wo biding tongshuai tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo biding ba tamen beijian de zhu chu jingwai, shi tamen chengwei shou lingru de.”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Zai tamen lai guishun wo zhiqian, nimen zhong you shei neng ba ta de baozuo na lai gei wo ne?”
Yige qiangliang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi zhiqian, wo ba ta na lai gei ni. Wo duiyu zhe jian shi, que shi ji shengren, you zhongshi kekao de.”

Na shen zhi tian jing de ren shuo:“Zhuan shunjian, wo jiu ba ta na lai gei ni.” Dang ta kanjian nage baozuo anzhi zai ta mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu de enhui zhi yi, ta yu yi ci shiyan wo, kan wo shi ganxie zhe, haishi gufu zhe. Ganxie zhe, zhi wei ziji de liyi er ganxie; gufu zhe (xuzhi) wo de zhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi zungui de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women kan ta neng fou renshi ziji de baozuo.”
Dang ta lai dao de shihou, youren shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zheyang ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.” Zai ta zhiqian, women yi huode zhishi, women yi shi guishun de
Ta she zhenzhu er chongbai de, fang'ai ta, ta ben shi shuyu bu xindao de minzhong

Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian de shihou, ta yiwei gongdian li shi yipian wangyang,(jiu tiqi yishang) luchu ta de liang tiao xiaotui. Ta shuo:“Zhe que shi yong boli zaocheng de guanghua de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que shi zi qi de, wo (xianzai) genzhe su lai man guishun zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu.”
Wo que yi paiqian sai mo de ren de dixiong ──sa li ha ──qu jiaohua tamen,(shuo):“Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu.” Tamen like fen wei liang pai, huxiang zhenglun
Ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen weisheme zai enhui zhiqian yaoqiu xingfa zaori shixian ne? Nimen zenme bu xiang zhenzhu qiurao, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women wei ni he ni de xintu er zao eyun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi zhenzhu suo zhuchi de. Buran, nimen shi yao shou kaoyan de.”
Dangri, cheng li you jiu huo ren, zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu

tamen shuo:“Nimen zhi zhenzhu huxiang mengshi ba!” Tamen shuo:“Women bi zai yejian mouhai ta he ta de xintu. Ranhou, women bi dui ta de zhu shuo:‘Ta de xintu yuhai de shihou, women meiyou zaichang, women que shi chengshi de ren.’”
Tamen ceng yong yige jimou, wo ye ceng yong yige jimou, dan tamen buzhi bu jue
Ni kan tamen de jimou de jieju shi zenyang de.(Jieguo) shi wo ba tamen he tamen de zongzu, quanti huimiele
Naxie shi tamen de fangwu, yin tamen de bu yi er bian wei tanta de. Duiyu you zhishi de minzhong ci zhong que you yige jixiang
Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao erqie jingwei de renmen
(Wo ceng paiqian) lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen zenme mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi ne
Nimen wubi yao she nuren er yi nanren manzu xingyu ma? Buran, nimen shi wu zhishi de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba lu te de xintu zhu chucheng wai, yinwei tamen shi chunjie de minzhong.” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de xintu, ta de qizi chuwai, wo yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa
Wo ceng jiang dayu qu shang tamen. Ceng shou jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu. Zhu ta suo xuan de zhong pu ping'an.” Jiujing shi zhenzhu geng hao ne? Haishi tamen yong lai pei zhen zhu de geng hao ne

Haishi nei tiandi de chuangzao zhe (geng hao), qie wei nimen cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yi peizhi meili de yuanpu zhe ne? Er nimen buneng shi yuanpu zhong de shumu shengzhang. Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen shi beimiu de minzhong

Haishi yi dadi wei anju zhi suo, shi zhu heliu guan qijian, shi zhu shan zhenya qi shang, bing zai liang hai zhi jian she yige pingzhang zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen daban buzhidao
Haishi na daying shounan zhe de qidao, er jiechu qi zaihai, qie yi nimen wei dadi de dai zhi zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Nimen hen shao juewu

Haishi na zai lu hai de chongchong hei'an zhong yindao nimen, zai jiang qi enhui zhiqian, shi feng wei chuan jiayin zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Zhenzhu chao hu tamen yong lai pei ta de

Haishi na chuangzao wanwu, ranhou jiayi fu zao, bing cong tianshang dixia gong nimen jiyang zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Ni shuo:“Nimen na nimen de zhengju lai ba, ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
Ni shuo:“Chu zhenzhu wai, zai tiandi jian, shei ye bu zhi youxuan, tamen bu zhidao shenme shihou fuhuo
Nandao tamen guanyu houshi de zhishi yijing chengshule ma? Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi huaiyi de. Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi mangmu di.”
Buxindao de ren shuo:“Nandao women he women de zuxian dou bian wei chentu hou hai yao bei fuhuo qilai ma
Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi tingguo zhe yi lei de konghe, zhege zhishi guren de shenhua.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang zai dimian shang luxing, yin'er guancha fanzui ren de jieju shi zenyang de.”
Ni buyao wei tamen de (beini) er youchou, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fanmen
Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de, huoxu you yibufen shi linjin nimen de.”
Ni de zhu duiyu shiren, que shi you da en de, dan tamen daban shi bu ganxie de
Ni de zhu, dique zhidao tamen de xiongzhong yinni de he tamen suo biaobai de
Tianshang dixia, meiyou yi jian yin wei de shiwu, bu jilu zai yi ben mingbai de tian jing zhong
Zhe bu “gulanjing”, dique ba yiselie de houyi suo zhenglun de da bu fen de shili gaosu tamen
Zhe bu “gulanjing” duiyu xindao zhe que shi xiangdao he enhui
Ni de zhu, biding wei tamen yizhao ta de jueding er caipan. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi quanzhi de
Ni yingdang xinlai zhenzhu, ni que shi ju you mingbai de zhenli de
Ni biding buneng shi siren ting (ni jiang dao). Ni biding buneng shi tuibi de longzi ting ni zhaohuan
Ni jue buneng yindao xiazi likai mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi xin wo de jixiang de ren, ting ni (jiang dao), tamen yin'er chengyi xindao.§
Dang yuyan dui tamen shixian de shihou, wo wei tamen er shi yi zhong dongwu cong di zhong shengchu, shanghai tamen, yinwei zhongren buxin wo de jixiang
Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong, jihe yiqun bu xin wo de jixiang de ren, er tamen shi bei pailie de zheng zhengqi qi de
Dengdao tamen lai dao (zhenzhu) nali de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen meiyou chedi zhidao wo de jixiang jiu jiayi fouren ma? Nimen jiujing zuole shenme ne?”
Yuyan jiang dui tamen de bu yi er dui tamen shixian, suoyi tamen ya kou wu yan
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo yi heiye zuo tamen de anxi shijian, yi baizhou zuo tamen guankan de shijian, duiyu xindao de minzhong qizhong que you xuduo jixiang
Zai na ri, jiang chui haojiao, chu zhenzhu suo yiyu de wai, fan zai tianshang dixia de dou yao kongbu, ge ge dou yao beijian de lai dao zhenzhu nali
Ni jian qun shan er yiwei dou shi guding de, qishi qun shan du xiang xing yun yang shiqu. Na shi jingzhi wanwu de zhenzhu de huagong, ta que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
Xingshan de ren jiang huode geng jia de baochou, zai na ri, tamen jiang mian yu kongbu
Zuo e de ren, jiang pufuzhe touru huo yu:“Nimen zhi shou nimen de xingwei de baochou.”
(Ni shuo):“Wo zhi fengming chongbai zhe chengshi de zhu, ta ceng yi zhe chengshi wei jindi. Wanwu dou shi ta suoyou de. Wo yi fengming zuo yige guishun de ren
bing xuandu “gulanjing”.” Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, ni dui shei shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe.”
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu, ta jiang xianshi gei nimen ta de jixiang, nimen jiu renshi ta. Ni de zhu, bing bu hushi nimen de xingwei.”
Ta, xin, mi mu
Zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian de jie wen
Wo benzhe zhenli, wei xindao de minzhong er dui ni xushu mu sa he falao de shiji
Falao que yi zai guo zhong aoman, ta ba guomin fencheng xuduo zongpai, er qifu qizhong de yipai ren; tusha tamen de nanhai, baoquan tamen de nuhai. Ta que shi shangfengbaisu de
Wo yao ba endian shangci gei da dishang shou qifu de ren, wo yao yi tamen wei biaoshuai, wo yao yi tamen wei jicheng zhe
wo yao shi tamen zai da dishang deshi, wo yao zhaoshi falao, ha man he tamen lia de jundui, duiyu zhexie bei qifu zhe suo tifang de shi

Wo ceng qishi mu sa de muqin (shuo):“Ni yingdang buru ta, dang ni pa ta shouhai de shihou, ni ba ta tou zai he li, ni buyao weiju, buyao youchou, wo biding yao ba ta song hai ni, wo biding yao renming ta wei shizhe.”
Falao de shicong ceng shiqule ta, yizhi ta chengwei tamen de diren he youhuan. Falao, ha man he ta lia de jundui, que shi cuowu de
Falao de qizi shuo:“(Zhe) shi wo he ni de weiji. Nimen buyao sha ta, yexu ta you liyu women, huozhe women ba ta shou wei yi zi.”(Tamen tingcong ta dehua), tamen buzhi bu jue
Mu sa de muqin de xin, bian cheng kongxu de. Ruo bushi wo shi ta an xiaxin lai, yi shi ta chengwei xindao de ren, ta jihu baolu zhenqingle
Ta dui ta de jiejie shuo:“Ni zhuizhe ta qu ba.” Ta jiu yuan yuan di kuice ta, tamen hao bu zhijue.§
Yiqian, wo jinzhi ta chi renhe ren de nai, ta de jiejie jiu shuo:“Wo jieshao nimen yijia ren, ti nimen yangyu ta, tamen shi zhongyu ta, hao ma?”
Yushi, wo ba ta song hai ta de muqin, yibian ta huode wei ji, bu zai youchou, erqie zhidao zhenzhu de yingxu shi zhenshi de, dan tamen daban bu zhidao
Dang ta tige qiangzhuang, zhili jianquan de shihou, wo shangci ta zhihui he xueshi. Wo yao zheyang baochou shanren

Cheng cheng li de ren shuhu de shihou, ta zou jin cheng lai, jiu zai cheng li faxianle liang geren zhengzai zhengdou, zhege shi shuyu ta de zongzu, nage shi shuyu ta de diren. Shuyu tongzu de ren yaoqiu ta bangzhe duifu ta de diren, mu sa jiu ba na diren yi quan da si. Ta shuo:“Zhe shi youyu emo de youhuo, emo que shi miren de ming di.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi zi qile, qiu ni raoshu wo ba.” Zhen zhu jiu raoshule ta, ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo jie ni suo ci wo de endian er qiu ni baoyou wo, wo jue bu zuo fanzui zhe de zhushou.”
Ci ri zaochen, ta zai cheng li zhanzhanjingjing de. Zuori xiang ta qiujiu di nageren huran you xiang ta gao sheng qiujiu. Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Ni que shi mingxian de mi wu zhe.”
Dang ta yu pu ji ta lia de diren de shihou, qiujiu di nage ren shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni yao xiang zuori sharen yiyang sha wo ma? Ni zhi xiang zuo zhe difang de baonue zhe, que buxiang zuo tiaojie zhe.”
Youyige ren, cong cheng de ji yuan chu mang lai shuo:“Mu sa a! Chen pumen dique zhengzai shangyi yao sha ni, ni kuai chuzou ba. Wo que shi zhongyu ni de.”
Ta jiu cong cheng li zhanzhanjingjing de tao chulaile, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo tuo li bu yi de minzhong.”
Dang ta yi quxiang mai de yan de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu yexu zhishi wo zhengdao.”

Dang ta lai dao mai de yan de quan bian de shihou, ta kanjian you yiqun ren zai nali yin yang. Ta faxian chu tamen wai hai you liang nuzi, lanzhe tamen lia de yang qun. Ta shuo:“Nimen lia weisheme zheyang ne?” Ta lia shuo:“Women yao dao mu renmen shi tamen de yang likai quanshui, cai de yin women de yang, women de fuqin shi yi wei long zhong de laoren.”
Ta jiu ti tamen lia yin yang, ranhou tui dao shu yin xia, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que xuqiu ni suo jiang gei wo de renhe fuli de.”

Na liang ge nuzi zhong de yige, xiuse de lai dui ta shuo:“Wo de fuqin dique yao qing ni qu, yao chouxie ni ti women yin yang de gonglao.” Dang ta lai dao ta mianqian, bingqie gaosu ta ziji de shiqing de shihou, ta shuo:“Ni buyao weiju, ni yi tuo li bu yi de minzhongle.”
Na liang ge nuzi zhong de yi ge shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni guyong ta. Ni zui hao guyong zhege you qiangzhuang you zhongshi de ren.”

Ta shuo:“Wo biding yi wo de zhe liang ge nu'er zhong de yige jia gei ni, dan ni bixu ti wo zuo ba nian gong. Ruguo ni zuo man shi nian, na shi ni ziyuan de, wo bu yuan keqiu yu ni. Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi yige shanren.”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo yu ni suo ding de hetong, wo wulun zuo man na yige qixian duiyu wo du buke you guofen de yaoqiu. Zhenzhu shi jiancha women de yue yan de.”§

Dang mu sa yi zuo man qixian, er daizhe ta de jiashu luxing de shihou, ta kanjian na zuo shan de zhe bian youyi chu huoguang, ta dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Nimen dengdai yixia, wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, yexu wo cong huoguang di nali dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo dai yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
Ta yi lai dao nage huoguang de fujin, shangu de you'an shang, you conglin de jixiang chu, fachu husheng shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo que shi zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu
ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba.” Ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she, jiu zhuanlian tuibi, bu gan zhuan huiqu.“Mu sa, ni zouxiang qian lai, buyao weiju, ni que shi anquan de

ni ba ni de shou charu huai zhong, ta jiang bailiang liang de chou chulai, que wu eji. Ni wei kongbu er ba ni de shou suo huiqu ba. Zhe liang jian shi ni de zhu suo jiang shi falao he ta de chen pumen de zhengju, tamen que shi fangdang de minzhong.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi shaguo tamen zhong de yige ren, suoyi wo pa tamen sha wo
Wo di gege ha lun, koucai bi wo hao, qiu ni pai ta tong wo qu, zuo wo de zhushou, zhengshi wo de shiming; wo dique pa tamen fouren wo.”

Zhenzhu shuo:“Wo jiang yi ni di gege zhu ni yibizhili, wo yao gei nimen lia yi zhong quanli, suoyi tamen buneng shanghai nimen lia. Nimen lia he shuncong nimen lia de, jiang jie wo de jixiang er wei shengli zhe.”

Dang mu sa yi daizhe wo de xuduo mingxian de jixiang lai dao tamen mianqian de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhege zhishi niezao de moshu, women meiyou tingjian zai women de zuxian (de shidai) you zhe jian dongxi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao shei dai laile cong ta nali jianglin de zhengdao, shei de xiangshou houshi de shan guo. Bu yi de ren biding bu hui chenggong.”

Falao shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo bu zhidao chu wo wai hai you bie de shenling. Ha man a! Ni yingdang ti wo shao zhuan, ranhou ti wo jianzhu yizuo gaolou, yexu wo de kuijian mu sa de zhuzai. Wo dique caixiang ta shi yige shuohuang zhe.”
Ta he ta de jundui, zai guo zhong wangzizunda, tamen caixiang ziji bu bei zhao guiyu wo
Wo jiu chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, ba tamen touru haizhong. Ni kan kan bu yi zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Wo yi tamen wei zhao ren yu huo yu de zuikui, fuhuo ri, tamen jiang bu huo yuanzhu
Zai jinshi wo shi zu ma zhuisui tamen; fuhuo ri, tamen jiang bian cheng chou'e de
Zai huimie yuangu de ge shidai zhihou, wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, yi zuo shiren de mingzheng, xiangdao he enhui, yibian tamen jinian
Dang wo yi wo de mingling qishi mu sa de shihou, ni meiyou zai xishan bian, ye meiyou qinyan kanjian
Dan wo ceng chuangzaole xuduo shidai, naxie shidai cengjingguo manchang de suiyue. Ni meiyou juzhu zai mai de yan ren zhi jian, dui tamen xuandu wo de jixiang, dan wo shi paiqian shizhe de

Dang wo zhaohuan (mu sa) de shihou, ni meiyou zai shan bian, dan zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiangxia de enhui, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe ceng jianglin tamen di naxie minzhong, yibian tamen jinian
Ruo bu wei tamen jianglai yao wei cengjing fanzui er zaoyang, bingqie shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni zenme bu pai yige shizhe lai jiaohua women, shi women de zunshou ni de jixiang, er wei xinshi ne?……”

Dang wo suo qishi de zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Ta weisheme buneng huode xiang mu sa suo huode de jixiang ne?” Nandao tamen meiyou fouren yiqian mu sa suo huode de jixiang ma? Tamen ceng shuo:“Liang zhong huxiang yinzheng de moshu.” Tamen ceng shuo:“Women biding yigai dou buxin.”
Ni shuo:“Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren, name, nimen na yi bu jingdian lai, zhiyao shi zhenzhu suo qishi de, bingqie shi bi zhe liang bu jingdian geng neng yindao renlei de, wo jiu zunshou ta.”

Ruguo tamen bu daying ni, name, ni yingdang zhidao tamen zhishi shuncong ziji de siyu. She zhenzhu suo qishi de zhengdao, er shuncong ziji de siyu zhe, you shei bi ta geng mi wu ne? Zhenzhu biding bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.§
Wo que yi xu shi zhenyan, yibian tamen jinian
Zai qishi zhe zhenyan zhiqian, ceng meng wo shangci tian jing de ren, shi quexin zhe zhenyan de
Dang youren dui tamen xuandu zhe zhenyan de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women quexin zhe zhenyan, ta que shi cong women de zhu jiang shi de, zai jiang shi ta zhiqian, women que shi guishun de.”
Zhe deng ren, yin neng jianren, qie neng yidebaoyuan, bing fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de, gu de jiabei de baochou
Dang tamen ting dao e yan de shihou, liji tuibi, tamen shuo:“Women you women de xingwei, nimen you nimen de xingwei. Zhu nimen ping'an! Women bu qiu yuren de youyi.”
Ni biding buneng shi ni suo xi'ai de ren zunxun zhengdao, zhenzhu que neng shi tasuo yiyu de ren zunxun zhengdao, ta zhidao shei shi zunxun zhengdao zhe

Tamen shuo:“Ruguo women yu ni gongtong zunshou zhengdao, women jiang bei quzhu chujing.” Nandao wo meiyou wei tamen er sheli yige anquan de jindi ma? Ge zhong de guoshi, dou fanyun dao jindi zhong lai, na shi cong wo jiangxia de jiyang, dan tamen daban bu zhidao

Wo ceng huimie xuduo chengshi, naxie chengshi li de jumin,guo yi zhong jiao she de shenghuo. Zhexie shi tamen de juzhu di, cong tamen miewang zhihou, chu hen shao de shijian wai, wu ren juzhu; wo shi tamen de jicheng zhe

Ni de zhu, bu hui huimie ge chengshi, zhidao ta zai shou yi zhong paiqian yige shizhe, dui ge chengshi de jumin xuandu ta de jixiang. Wo bu hui huimie ge chengshi, chufei chengshi li de jumin duo xing bu yi
Nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de jiyang he zhuangshi, zai zhenzhu nali de (baochou) shi geng youliang de, shi geng changjiu de. Nandao nimen bu lijie ma
Dedao wo di meihao de yingxu, er jiang huode shihui de ren, yu zai jinshi shenghuo zhong huode wo de jiyang er zai fuhuo ri bei chuanhuan zhe, bici xiangsi ma
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangcheng wo de huoban zhe, rujin zai nali ne?”

Shou panjue de renmen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women ceng shi zhexie ren mi wu, guran women mi wu tamen, dan tamen xiang women ziji yiyang mi wule. Women xiang ni shengming: Women yu tamen wugan, tamen meiyou chongbai women.”

Jiang yong shengyin zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen ba nimen de pei zhu zhaohuan lai ba!” Tamen jiu zhaohuan tamen, dan tamen bu daying, tamen ziji kanjian xingfa, jiu xiwang tamen shengqian shi zunxun zhengdao de
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suoyong yi dafu shizhemen de shi shenme ne?”
Zai na ri, yiqie zhengju jiang dui tamen bian cheng aimei de, suoyi tamen bu xiang xunwen
Zhiyu huizui, xindao he xingshan de ren, huoxu shi chenggong de
Ni de zhu, chuangzao tasuo yiyu de, xuanze tasuo yiyu de, tamen meiyou xuanze de quanli. Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong lai pei ta de
Ni de zhu zhidao tamen de xiongzhong suo yincang de he tamen (de koutou) suo biaobai de
Ta shi zhenzhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, jinshi houshi de zansong quan gui ta, panjue zhi you ta zuochu. Nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo zhenzhu shi heiye wei nimen yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu zhenzhu wai, na yige shenling neng ba guangming dai lai gei nimen ne? Nandao nimen bu hui tinghua ma?”

Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo zhenzhu shi baizhou wei nimen yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu zhenzhu wai, na yige shenling neng ba heiye dai lai gei nimen, yibian nimen anxi ne? Nandao nimen bu hui guancha ma?”
Ta wei lianxu nimen er wei nimen chuangzao heiye he baizhou, yibian nimen zai heiye anxi, er zai baizhou xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, rujin zai nali ne?”
Wo jiang cong mei yige minzu zhong xuanba yige zhengren, bingqie shuo:“Nimen ba nimen de zhengju na lai ba!” Tamen cai zhidao zhenli shi zhenzhu de, tamen shengqian suo weizao de, yi huibi tamenle.§

Ge lun dique shuyu mu sa de zongzu, dan ta nuedai tamen. Wo ceng shangci ta xuduo caibao, naxie caibao de yaoshi shi ji ge lishi suo buneng sheng ren de. Dangri, ta de zongzu dui ta shuo:“Buyao kuangxi, zhenzhu que shi bu ai kuangxi zhe

Ni yingdang jie zhenzhu shangci ni de caifu er ying mou houshi de zhuzhai, ni buyao wangque ni zai jinshi de ding fen. Ni dang yi shandai ren, xiang zhenzhu yi shandai ni yiyang. Ni buyao zai difang shang bainong shifei, zhenzhu que shi bu ai bainong shifei zhe.”

Ta shuo:“Wo huode zhe xiang caifu, zhishi yinwei wo you teshu de zhishi bale.” Nandao ta bu zhidao ma? Zai ta zhiqian, zhenzhu suo huimie de ge shidai de eren, you bi ta nengli geng qiang, jixu geng duo de. Fanzui de ren, shi bubi jiayi shenwen de
Ge lun ceng shengzhuang chuyou, yi haohua kuashi ziji de zongzu. Ai jinshi shenghuo de ren shuo:“Dan yuan women huode ge lun suo huode de (caifu), ta que shi you dafu fen de.”
You xueshi de ren shuo:“Shang zai nimen! Zhenzhu de baochou, duiyu xindao erqie xingshan de ren shi geng hao de, zhiyou jianren de ren de xiangshou na zhong baochou.”
Wo shi ta he ta de fangwu lunxian zai dimian xia, ta meiyou dangyu xiezhu ta dikang zhenzhu, ta ye buneng ziwei

Zuotian xianmu ge lun de jingyu de ren shuo:“Ni bujian ma? Zhenzhuyao shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu;(yao shi nage puren de jiyang jiongpo), jiu shi ta jiongpo. Jiaruo meiyou zhenzhu dui women de endian, ta bi shi women lunxian zai dimian xia. Ni bu zhidao ma? Gu en de ren, shi bu hui chenggong de.”
Zhe shi houshi de zhuzhai, wo yao yong lai fu da na bu yuan aoman ye bu yuan duoluo de ren. Shan guo zhi gui jingwei de ren
Xingshan de ren jiang de geng hao de baochou, zuo'e de ren, zhi shou zuo'e shi de baochou
Ba “gulanjing” jiang shi gei ni de, bi shi ni fu fan guxiang. Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao shei shi zhaoshi zhengdao de, shei shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de.”
Ni bing wei xiwang zhenzhu ba zhe bu jingdian shangci ni, dan na shi youyu ni de zhu de enhui. Ni jue buyao zuo bu xindao zhe de zhushou
Zhenzhu de jixiang jiang shi ni zhihou, ni jue buyao ren tamen fang'ai ni xuanyang naxie jixiang. Ni yingdang zhao ren lai guishun ni de zhu, ni jue buyao zuo yi wu pei zhu zhe
Chu zhenzhu wai, ni buyao qidao bie de renhe shenling, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Chu ta de benti wai, wanwu dou yao huimie. Panjue zhi you ta zuochu, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.§
Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Zhongren yiwei tamen de ziyou de shuo:“Women yi xindaole” que bu shou kaoyan ma
Wo que yi kaoyan zai tamen zhiqian de ren. Zhenzhu biding yao zhidao shuo shihua zhe, biding yao zhidao shuohuang zhe
Nandao zuo'e de ren yiwei tamen neng tao chu wo de fawang ma? Tamen de panduan zhen elie
fan xiwang huijian zhenzhu zhe, shei dou yingdang zhidao zhenzhu de qixian shi biding jianglin de, zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Fan fendou zhe, dou zhi wei ziji er fendou, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu yu quan shijie de
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo biding gouxiao tamen de zui'e, wo biding yi tamen de xingwei de zui you de baochou shangci tamen
Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu;“ruguo ta lia leling ni yong ni suo bu zhidao de dongxi pei wo, name, ni buyao fucong ta lia. Nimen yao guiyu wo, wo yao ba nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen.”
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo biding shi tamen ru yu shanren zhi lie

Youxie ren shuo:“Women yi xin zhenzhule.” Dang tamen wei zhenzhu er shou pohai de shihou, tamen ba zhongren de pohai dangzuo zhenzhu de xingfa. Ruguo yuanzhu cong nimen de zhu jianglin, tamen biding shuo:“Women que shi yu nimen tong zai yiqi de.” Nandao zhenzhu bushi zhidao shiren de xiongjin de ma
zhenzhu dique zhidao xindao zhe, dique zhidao wei xinzhe
Bu xindao de ren dui xindao de ren shuo:“Nimen zunshou women de jiao dao ba! Rang women danfu nimen de zuiguo.” Qishi, tamen jue buneng danfu tamen de yidian zuiguo, tamen que shi shuohuang de
Tamen biding danfu ziji de zhong dan, zai jia shang bie de zhongdan, fuhuo ri tamen duiyu ziji suo weizao de huangyan bi shoushen wen
Wo que yi pai nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, ta zai tamen zhi jian, douliule jiubai wushi nian, hongshui jiu xijile tamen, yinwei tamen shi bu yi de
Wo zhengjiule ta he yu ta tongchuan de ren, wo yi na wei quan shijie de yige jixiang
(Wo que yi paiqian) yi bo la xin, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu, bing dang jingwei ta, zhe duiyu nimen shi geng hao de. Ruguo nimen zhidao

Chu zhenzhu wai, nimen zhi chongbai ouxiang, nimen zhi niezao wangyan. Nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de (ouxiang), buneng zhuchi nimen de jiyang, suoyi, nimen yingdang dao zhen zhu nali xunqiu jiyang, nimen yingdang chongbai ta, nimen yingdang ganxie ta, nimen zhi bei zhao gui ta
Ruguo nimen fouren (wo), name, zai nimen zhiqian de xuduo minzu, ye fourenguo (tamen de shizhe) le. Shizhe de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda.”
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zhenzhu zenyang chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou shi tamen fuhuo ma? Zhe duiyu zhenzhu shi rongyi de
Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang zai da dishang luxing, yin'er guancha zhenzhu zenyang chuangzao zhongsheng, you zenyang zaizao tamen. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
Ta chengfa tasuo yiyu zhe, lianxu tasuo yiyu zhe, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta
Nimen wulun zai dishang huo tianshang, dou buneng taobi tianqian, chu zhenzhu wai, nimen meiyou renhe jianhu zhe, ye meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.”
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang ji yu zhenzhu huijian de, zhe deng ren, dui wo de enhui yi juewangle, zhe deng ren, jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen sha si ta, huo shao si ta ba!” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu. Zhenzhu zhengjiu ta tuoli liehuo, duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Ta shuo:“Nimen she zhenzhu er yi ouxiang wei shenling, zhi wei jinshi shenghuo zhong huxiang qin'ai bale. Dan zai fuhuo ri, nimen jiang huxiang dilai, huxiang zuzhou, nimen de guisu shi huo yu, nimen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe.”§
Lu te jiu wei ta er xindao. Yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo biding qianyi dao wo de zhu nali qu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.”
Wo shangci ta yi si ha ge he ye er gu bai, wo yi yuyan he tian jing shangci ta de houyi, wo ba ta zai jinshi de baochou shangci ta, zai houshi bi zai shanren zhi lie
(Wo ceng paiqian) lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen dique gan choushi, zai nimen zhiqian, quan shijie de ren meiyouyige ganguo zhe zhong choushi de
Nimen wubi yao jiang nan zuo nu, lanlu zuo'e, dangzhong xuan yin ma?” Ta de zongzu shuo:“Ni ba zhenzhu de xingfa zhaoshi women ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de ren.” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhu wo, yi duikang shangfengbaisu de renmen.”
Dang wo de shizhe daizhe jiayin laifang yi bo la xin de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women biding huimie zhege chengshi de jumin. Zhege chengshi de jumin, que shi bu yi de.”

Ta shuo:“Lu te dique zai zhege chengshi li.” Tamen shuo:“Women zhidao zai zhege chengshi li de ren, women biding yao zhengjiu ta he ta de xintu, ta de qizi chuwai, ta shi he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa de.”

Dang wo de shizhe laifang lu te de shihou, ta wei tamen er youchou, ta wufa baohu tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa, buyao youchou, women biding zhengjiu ni he ni de xintu, ni de qizi chuwai, ta shi he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa de.”
Wo bi shi tianzai cong tiankong jiang yu zhege chengshi de jumin, na shi youyu tamen di fangdang
Wo que yi wei neng liaojie de minzhong, er jiang zhege chengshi de yizhi liuzhe zuo yige mingxian de jixiang
(Wo ceng paiqian) shu a bo qu jiaohua mai de yan ren, ta jiu shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu, yingdang weiju mori, buyao zai difang shang wei fei zuo dai, bainong shifei.”
Dan tamen fouren ta, dizhen jiu xijile tamen. Qingke zhi jian, tamen dou jiang wo zai ge ren de jiazhong

(Wo ceng huimie) a de ren he sai mo de ren, nimen cong tamen juzhu di difang, que yi mingbai tamen bei huimie de qingxing. Emo yi tamen de xingwei, mihuo tamen er zu'ai tamen zunxun zhengdao, tamen yuanlai shi neng siwei de
(Wo ceng huimie) ge lun, falao he ha man. Mu sa ceng zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, dan tamen zai difang shang zi da, tamen wei neng taobi tianqian

Mei yige ren, wo du yin ta de zuiguo er jiayi chengfa, tamen zhong you wo ceng shi feishazoushi de baofeng qu shanghai de, you wei kongbu suo xiji de, you wo shi ta lunxian zai dimian xia de, you bei wo ni sha de, zhenzhu buzhi kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji
Youxie ren, she zhenzhu er bie qiu jianhu zhe, tamen piru zhizhu zao wu, zui cuiruo de fangwu, que shi zhizhu de fangwu. Jiaruo tamen renshi zhege daoli,(jiu bu hui chongbai ouxiangle)
Zhenzhu dique zhidao tamen she ta er qidao de renhe wu, ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
Zhexie piyu, shi wo wei zhongren er she de, zhiyou xuezhe neng liaojie ta
Zhenzhu ben zhenli er chuangzao tiandi, duiyu xindao de ren, ci zhong que you yi zhong jixiang
Ni yingdang xuandu qishi ni de jingdian, ni dang jin shou bai gong, bai gong dique neng fangzhi choushi he zui'e, jinian zhenzhu que shi yi jian geng da de shi. Zhenzhu zhidao nimen de zuo wei

Chu yi zui you de fangshi wai, nimen buyao yu xinfeng tian jing de ren bianlun, chufei tamen zhong bu yi de ren. Nimen yingdang shuo:“Women quexin jiang shi women de jingdian, he jiang shi nimen de jingdian; women suo chongbai de he nimen suo chongbai de shi tong yige shenming, women shi guishun ta de.”
Wo zheyang ba jingdian jiang shi ni, meng wo shangci jingdian de ren, dou quexin ta. Zhe deng ren zhong, yeyou quexin ta de, zhiyou buxindao de ren, fouren wo de jixiang
Yiqian, ni bu hui dushu, ye bu hui xiezi,(jiaruo ni hui dushu xiezi,) name, fandui zhenli de ren biding huaiyi
Buran, zhe shi wo de mingxian de jixiang, ta baocun zai xuezhe de xiongzhong, zhiyou bu yi de ren fouren wo de jixiang
Tamen shuo:“Zenme meiyou yi zhong jixiang cong ta de zhu jianglin ta ne?” Ni shuo:“Jixiang zhi zai zhenzhu nali, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Wo jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, keyi dui tamen changchang xuandu, nandao hai buneng shi tamen manyi ma? Zai zhe jingdian li duiyu xindao de ren que you enhui he jinian
Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu zuo wo he ni zhi jian de jianzheng yijing goule. Ta zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie, quexin xieshen er buxin zhenzhu zhe, que shi kui she de.”
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa, jiaruo meiyou dingqi, name xingfa bi yi jianglin tamen. Dang tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, xingfa biding huran jianglin tamen
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa. Huo yu biding shi baowei bu xindao zhe de
Zai na ri, xingfa jiang cong tamen de tou shang he jiaoxia jianglin tamen. Ta shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen de xingwei de guobao ba!”
Wo de xindao de purenmen a! Wo de dadi que shi kuanda de, nimen yingdang zhi chongbai wo
Mei yige you xi qi de, dou yao chang si de ziwei, ranhou, nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu wo
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo bi shi tamen zai leyuan zhong de ju zaixia lin zhu he de lou shang, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Gongzuo zhe de baochou zhen hao
tamen shi jianren de, tamen zhi xintuo tamen de zhu
Xuduo dongwu, buneng danfu ziji de jiyang, zhenzhu gongji tamen he nimen, ta shi quan cong de, shi quanzhi de
Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi, zhifule ri yue?” Tamen biding shuo:“Zhenzhu.” Tamen shi ruhe huangmiu de
zhenzhuyao shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu,(yao shi nage pu ren de jiyang jiongpo,) jiu shi ta jiongpo, zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanshi de

Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui? Er jie yushui shi yi si de dadi fuhuo ne?” Tamen biding shuo:“Zhenzhu.” Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu!” Buran, tamen daban shi bu liaojie de
Zhe zhong jinshi de shenghuo, zhishi yule he youxi; houshi de zhuzhai, que shi chongman shenghuo de. Jiaruo tamen zhidao……
dang tamen cheng chuan de shihou, tamen chengken de qidao zhenzhu, dang ta shi tamen ping'an denglu de shihou, tamen like jiu yi wu pei zhu
Jiao tamen gufu wo shangci tamen de enhui ba, jiao tamen xiangle ba. Tamen jianglai jiu zhidaole
Nandao tamen meiyou zhidao ma? Wo ceng yi tamen de chengshi wei anning de jin de, er tamen sizhou de jumin bei ren jie lue. Nandao tamen quexin xieshen, er gufu zhenzhu de enhui ma
Jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao, huo fouren yi jianglin de zhenli zhe, shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? Nandao huo yu li meiyou gu en zhe de zhuchu ma
Wei wo er fendou de ren, wo biding zhiyin tamen wo de daolu, zhenzhu que shi yu shanren tong zai yiqi de.§
Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Luoma ren yi baibei
yu zuijindi difang. Tamen ji bai zhihou, jiang huo shengli
yu shu nian zhi jian. Yiqian he yihou, fanshi guizhenzhu zhuchi. Zai na ri, xindao de ren jiangyao huanxi
Zhe shi youyu zhenzhu de yuanzhu, ta yuanzhu tasuo yiyu zhe. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Zhenzhu yingxu (tamen shengli), zhen zhu bing bu shuangyue, dan renmen daban bu zhidao
Tamen zhi zhidao jinshi shenghuo de biaomian, tamen duiyu houshi, shi shuhu de
Nandao tamen meiyou yongxin siwei ma? Zhen zhu chuangzao tiandi wanwu, zhi yi zhenli he dingqi, you xuduo ren dique bu xin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen nuli geng da, qian ren yu difang de ken zhi he jianshe, shengguo tamen. Tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng daizhe mingzheng lailin tamen, gu zhen zhu buzhi kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji
Ranhou e bao nai zuo'e zhe de jieju, yinwei tamen fouren zhenzhu de jixiang, erqie jiayi chaoxiao
Zhenzhu chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, ranhou, nimen bei zhao guiyu ta
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, fanzui de ren, jiangcheng jusang de
Tamen de pei zhu zhong, jianglai meiyou wei tamen shuo qing de, tamen jiang fouren tamen de pei zhu
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, tamen jiang bici fenli
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang zai yige shengdi, ganjue kuaile
zhiyu bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang, yiji houshi de xiang hui zhe, jiang bei jujin zai xingfa zhong
Gu nimen zai wan xi he zaochen, yingdang zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu
Tiandi jian de zansong, yiji bangwan de he zhongwu de zansong dou zhi guiyu ta
Ta shi shengwu cong si wu zhongshengchu, shi si wu cong shengwu zhong shengchu, shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, nimen ye yao ruci bei fuhuo
Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta yong nitu chuangzao nimen, ranhou, nimen like chengwei renlei, sanbu ge fang

Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta cong nimen de tonglei zhong wei nimen chuangzao pei'ou, yibian nimen yilian tamen, bingqie shi nimen huxiang ai yue, huxiang lianxu. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Tiandi de chuangzao, yiji nimen de yuyan he fuse de chayi, duiyu you xuewen de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Nimen zai heiye he baizhou shuimian bingqie xunqiu ta de enhui; duiyu hui tinghua de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta shi nimen yi kongbu he qitu de xinqing kan dianguang, ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, jie yushui shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, duiyu neng liaojie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Tiandi yi ta de yizhi er jianding, dang ta dui changmian dixia de nimen jiaohuan yisheng de shihou, nimen like jiu chulaile
Tiandi wanwu, zhishi ta de; yiqie dou fucong ta
Ta chuangzao zhong sheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, zaizao duiyu ta shi geng rongyi de. Tiandi jian zuigao de dianxing, zhi shuyu ta, ta shi wanneng de, zhi rui de

Ta wei nimen er jiu nimen zishen she yige piyu; nandao nimen zhunxu nimen de nubi yu nimen gongtong xiangshou wo shangci nimen de jiyang, er nimen yu tamen wanquan pingdeng, nimen weiju tamen, youru nimen huxiang weiju yiyang ma? Wo zheyang wei neng liaojie de minzhong jieshi wo de jixiang
Buran, bu yi zhe, wuzhi di shuncong ziji de siyu. Zhenzhu shi zhi mi wu de ren, shei neng yindao ta ne? Tamen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe
Ni yingdang quxiang zhengjiao,(bing jin shou) zhenzhu suo fuyu ren de benxing. Zhenzhu suo chuangzao de, shi burong biangeng de; zhe cai shi zhengjiao, dan renmen bu ban bu zhidao.§
Nimen yingdang guiyi zhenzhu, yingdang jingwei ta, yingdang jin shou bai gong, buyao zuo yi wu pei zhu zhe
ji fenli ziji de zongjiao, er ge cheng zongpai zhe; ge pai dou xihuan ziji suo feng de zongpai
Renmen zaonan de shihou, qidao tamen de zhu, tongshi guiyi ta. Dang ta shi tamen changshi ta de enhui de shihou, tamen zhong de yibufen ren, like yi wu pei zhu
yizhi gufu wo suo ci tamen de endian. Nimen xiangshou ba, nimen jianglai jiu zhidaole
Nandao wo ceng jiang shi tamen yige mingzheng, mingling tamen yi wu pei zhu ma
Dang wo shi renmen changshi enhui de shihou, tamen jiu wei na jian enhui er zhanzhanzixi; ruguo tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui er zaonan, tamen like jiu juewangle
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu;(yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo,) jiu shi ta jiongpo. Duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ni yingdang ba jinqin, pinmin he luke suo ying xiang de quanli, jiao gei tamen, duiyu yao xiang huode zhenzhu de xiyue zhe, zhe shi geng hao de, zhe deng ren que shi chenggong de
Nimen wei chi li er fang de zhai, yu zai taren de caichan zhong zengjia de, zai zhenzhu nali, bu hui zengjia; nimen suo shi de caiwu, yu de zhenzhu de xiyue de, bidei jiabei de baochou

Zhenzhu chuangzao nimen, ranhou gongji nimen, ranhou shi nimen siwang, ranhou shi nimen fuhuo, nimen de pei zhu, shei neng zuo naxie shiqing zhong de renhe yi jian shiqing ne? Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong lai pei ta de
Zaihai yin zhongren suo fan de zui'e er xianxian yu dalu he haiyang, yizhi zhenzhu shi tamen changshi ziji de xingwei de yidian baochou, yibian tamen huiwu
Ni shuo: Nimen yingdang zai dadishang luxing, yin'er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de. Tamen daban shi yi wu pei zhu de
Zai buke kangju de rizi cong zhenzhu lailin yiqian, ni yingdang quxiang zhengjiao, zai na ri, tamen jiang bici fenli
Buxindao zhe, jiang zi shou qi bu xin de e bao, xingshan zhe zhi wei ziji yubei anzhai
yibian zhenzhu yong ta de endian qu baochou xindao erqie xingshan zhe. Zhenzhu que shi bu xi'ai bu xindao zhe de
Ta de yi zhong jixiang shi: Ta paiqian feng lai chuanda jiayin, shi nimen changshi ta de enhui, shi chuanbo feng ta de mingling er hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe, qu jiaohua tamen de zongzu, naxie shizhe jiu zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, ranhou, wo chengzhi fanzui de ren. Yuanzhu xinshi, yuan shi wo de zeren

Zhenzhu pai feng qu xingqi yun lai, ranhou, renyi di shi yun sanbu zai tiankong, bingqie ba yun fencheng suipian, ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun zhong luoxia. Dang ta shi yu luo zai tasuo yiyu de puren shang de shihou, tamen like huanle
jishi zai jiangyu zhiqian, tamen que shi jusang de
Ni kan zhenzhu de enhui de xiaoguo ba! Ta zenyang shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, na que shi neng qisihuisheng de. Ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Ruguo wo shi yizhenfeng chui qu, er tamen kanjian hemiao bian cheng weihuang de, cihou, tamen jiu biding bian cheng gu en zhe
Ni bi buneng shi siren ting (ni jiang dao), ni bi buneng shi tuibi de longzi ting ni huhuan
Ni bi buneng yindao xiazi likai mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi quexin wo de jixiang de renmen ting ni (jiang dao), tamen shi guishun zhe.§

Zhenzhu cong nuoruo chuangzao nimen, zai nuoruo zhihou, you chuangzao qiangzhuang, zai qiangzhuang zhihou you chuangzao nuoruo he bai fa, ta yao chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de
Fuhuo shi jianglin zhi ri, fanzui de ren fa shi shuo tamen zhi douliule yi shashi, tamen yuan shi zheyang beimiu de
You xuewen he xinde zhe shuo:“Yi zhenzhu de qian ding, nimen que yi douliu dao fuhuo ri. Zhe jiushi fuhuo ri, dan nimen bu zhidao.”
Zai na ri, bu yi zhe de bian ci, wu bi yu zishen, tamen ye bude yao en
Zai zhe “gulanjing” zhong, wo que yi wei zhongren shele ge zhong piyu. Ruguo ni zhaoshi tamen yi zhong jixiang, name, bu xindao zhe biding shuo:“Nimen zhishi huangdan de!”
Zhenzhu zheyang fengbi wuzhishi zhe de xin
Ni jianren ba, zhenzhu de yingxu que shi zhenshi de. Ni buyao rang bu jianxin de ren shi ni qing lu
Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Zhexie shi you zhihui de jingdian de jie wen
shi xingshan zhe de xiangdao he enhui
Xingshan zhe, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, qie quexin houshi
Zhe deng ren, shi zunshou tamen de zhu de zhengdao de, zhe deng ren que shi chenggong de
Youren goumai wuwei de tanhua, yibian ta wu zhi wu shi di shi ren beili zhenzhu de zhengdao, erqie ba ta dang zuo xiaobing. Zhe deng ren, jiang shou lingru de xingfa
Youren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang de shihou, ta zi dadi tuibi, fangfu meiyou tingjian yiyang, fangfu ta de liang er zhong ting yiyang. Ni yi tongku de xingfa, xiang ta baoxi ba
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, bi jiang xiangshou ji leyuan
er yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi zhenzhu de zhenshi de yingxu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Ta chuangzao zhu tian, er buyong nimen suo neng jian de zhizhu; ta zai da dishang anzhi xuduo shanyue, yimian da di dongyao, shi nimen bu'an; ta zai da dishang sanbu ge zhong dongwu. Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, er zai da dishang zisheng ge zhong youliang de zhiwu
Zhe shi zhenzhu suo chuangzao de, nimen zhishi wo ba. Nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de (ouxiang) jiujing chuangzaole shenme ne? Buran, bu yi de ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de
Wo que yi ba zhihui shangci lu ge man,(wo shuo:)“Ni dang ganxie zhenzhu. Ganxie de ren, zhi wei ziji er ganxie, gufu de ren, xuzhi zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de.”
Dangri, lu ge man ceng jiaoxun ta de erzi shuo:“Wo de xiaozi a! Ni buyao yi renhe wu pei zhu. Yi wu pei zhu, que shi danibudao de.”
Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu ──ta muqin ruo shang jia ruo de huaizhe ta, ta de duan ru, shi zai liang nian zhi zhong ──wo shuo:“Ni yingdang ganxie wo he ni de fumu; wei wo shi zuihou de guisu

Ruguo ta lia leling ni yi ni suo bu zhidao de dongxi pei wo, name, ni buyao fucong ta lia, zai jinshi, ni yingdang yi li yi er feng shi ta lia, ni yingdang zunshou guiyi wo zhe de daolu; wei wo shi nimen de guisu, wo yao ba nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen.”

(Lu ge man) shuo:“Wo de xiaozi a! Shan e de xingwei, sui xiao ru jie zi, yincang zai panshi li, huo zai tiankong zhong, huo zai di dixia, zhenzhu dou yao xianshi ta. Zhenzhu que shi mingcha de, que shi che zhi de
Wo de xiaozi a! Ni yingdang jin shou bai gong, yingdang quan shan jie e, yingdang renshou huannan, zhe que shi yinggai juexin zuo de shiqing
Ni buyao wei miaoshi zhongren er zhuanlian, buyao yangyang deyi di zai da dishang xingzou. Zhenzhu que shi bu xi'ai yiqie aoman zhe, jinkua zhe de
Ni yingdang jiezhi ni de bufa, ni yingdang yizhi ni de shengyin; zui taoyan de shengyin, que shi luzi de shengyin.”

Nandao nimen bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu ceng wei nimen zhifu tiandi jian de yiqie, ta bo shi nimen biao li de enhui. Youren zhenglun zhenzhu de de xing, dan tamen ji wu zhishi, you wu xiangdao, qie wu canlan de jingdian

Ruguo youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang zunshou zhenzhu suo jiang shi de (jingdian).” Tamen jiu shuo:“Buran, women zunshou women zuxian de yijiao.” Jishi emo jiao tamen qu shou liehuo de xingfa,(tamen reng yao zunxun zuxian de yijiao) ma?§
Chengxin guishun zhenzhu erqie changxing shanshi zhe, que yi bawo zhu jiangu de babing. Wanshi de jieju, zhi guizhenzhu
Buxindao zhe, ni buyao wei tamen de bu xin er youchou, tamen zhi guiyu wo, wo yao ba tamen de xingwei gaosu tamen. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi tamen de xionghuai de
Wo shi tamen shaoshao xiangshou xingfu, ranhou, qiangpo tamen qu shou yanli de xingfa
Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“Zhenzhu.” Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu!” Buran, tamen daban bu zhidao
Tiandi wanwu zhishi zhenzhu de, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de
Jiaruo yong da dishang suoyou de shu lai zhi cheng bi, yong haishui zuo mozhi, zai jia shang qihai de mozhi, zhong buneng xie jin zhenzhu de yanyu. Zhenzhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de
Chuangzao nimen he fuhuo nimen, zhi xiang chuangzao yige ren he fuhuo yige ren yiyang. Zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye, bing zhifu ri yue, gezi yunxing, zhi yi dingqi. Zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
Na shi yin wei zhenzhu que shi zhenshi de; tamen she ta er qidao de, que shi xuwei de; zhenzhu que shi zhizun de, que shi zhi da de
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Chuanbo zai haizhong daizhe zhenzhu de enhui er hangxing, yibian ta zhishi nimen ta de yibufen jixiang, duiyu mei ge jianren de, ganxie de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Dang shanyue ban de botao longzhao tamen de shihou, tamen qiancheng de qidao zhenzhu, dang ta shi tamen ping'an denglu de 311 shihou, tamen zhong you zhong he de ren; zhiyou mei ge jiaohua de, gu en de ren, fouren wo de jixiang

Renmen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, nimen yingdang weiju na yi ri, fuqin duiyu erzi hao wu biyi, erzi duiyu fuqin ye hao wu biyi. Zhenzhu de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de. Jue buyao rang jinshi de shenghuo qipian nimen, jue buyao rang hua zei yi zhenzhu de rongren qipian nimen

Zai zhenzhu nali, dique you guanyu fuhuo shi de zhishi, ta chang jiang jishiyu, ta zhidao tai er de (xingbie); er renhe ren dou bu zhidao ziji mingri jiang zuo shenme shi, renhe ren dou bu zhidao ziji jiang si zai shenme difang. Zhen zhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi che zhi de
Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
(Zhe) shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de jingdian, qizhong hao wuyi yi
Tamen shuo:“Ta niezao ta ma?” Buran! Ta shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe lailinguo de yiqun minzhong, yibian tamen zunxun zhengdao
Zhen zhu ceng zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou, sheng shang baozuo, chu ta wai, nimen meiyou renhe jianhu zhe he shuo qing zhe. Nimen zenme bu jinian ne
ta zhili zi tian zhi di de shiwu, ranhou na shiwu zai yi ri zhi nei shangsheng dao ta nali, na yi ri de changdu, shi nimen suo jisuan de yiqian nian
Na shi quanzhi youming de, wanneng de, zhi ci de zhu
Ta jingzhi tasuo chuangzao de wanwu, ta zuichu yong nitu chuangzao ren
Ranhou yong jian shui de jinghua chuang 312	di san'er zhang koutou (sai zhi de) zao ta de zisun
Ranhou shi ta jianquan, bing jiang ta de jingshen chui zai ta de shenti zhong, you wei nimen chuangzao ermu xinling. Nimen hen shao ganxie
Tamen shuo:“Women xiaoshi zai dixia zhihou, nandao women biding chongxin shou zao ma?” Buran! Tamen buxin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.§
Ni shuo:“Fengming zhuchi nimen de shengming de sishen, jiang shi nimen siwang, ranhou nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu nimen de zhu.”

Jiaruo ni de jian fanzui zhe zai tamen de zhu nali chuitousangqi de shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yijing kanjianle, tingjianle, qiu ni rang women zhuan huiqu, women jiang zuo shanshi, women que shi quexinzhe.” Jiaruo ni kanjian zhe zhong qingzhuang……
Jiaruo wo yiyu, bi yi xiangdao fuyu mei geren, dan cong wo fachu de panci yi quedingle, wo bi yi jingling he renlei yiqi tian man huo yu
Nimen changshi ba! Yinwei nimen wangji jinri de xiang hui, wo que yi wangji nimenle. Nimen yinwei ziji de xingwei er changshi yongjiu de xingfa ba
Xinyang wo de jixiang de, zhiyou na deng ren; bieren yi wo de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tamen bian fufu koutou bing zansong tamen di na chaojue wanwu de zhu, tamen bu gan wangzizunda,※
tamen le bu luo chuang, tamen yi kongju he xiwang de xinqing qidao tamen de zhu; tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de
Renhe ren dou bu zhidao yi wei tamen zhucangle shenme weiji, yi baochou tamen de xingwei
Xindao zhe yu beini zhe yiyang ma? Tamen shi bu xiangdeng de
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jianglai deyi leyuan wei guisu, na shi weile baochou tamen de xingwei de
Zhiyu beini zhe, tamen de guisu, zhishi huo yu, mei dang tamen yao xiang tao chu, dou bei lan huiqu. You shengyin dui tamen shuo:“Nimen changshi yiqian nimen suo fouren de huoxing ba!”
Zai zuida de xingfa zhiqian, wo bi shi tamen changshi zuijin de xingfa, yibian tamen huiwu
Youren yi zhu de jixiang quan jie ta, er ta bu ken tingcong, zheyang de ren, shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? Wo biran yao chengzhi fanzui de ren
Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, suoyi ni duiyu jieshou jingdian, buyao xianyu youyu zhong, wo ceng yi na bu jingdian wei yiselie houyi de xiangdao
Wo ceng yi tamen zhong de yibufen renwei biaoshuai, dang tamen renshou jiannan, quexin wo de jixiang de shihou, feng wo de mingling qu yindao zhongren
Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu biding panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei
Nandao tamen hai bu xiaode ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen changchang jingguo naxie ren de guxiang, zai nali que you xuduo jixiang. Tamen zenme bu tingcong ne
Tamen hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ba yushui gan dao wu cao di difang, er jie ta shengchu tamen de shengchu he tamen ziji suo shi de zhuangjia. Nandao tamen kan bujian ma
Tamen shuo:“Zhe zhong panjue shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.”
Ni shuo:“Buxindao zhe, zai panjue ri, sui xin wuyi, bingqie bu huode kuandai.”
Ni yingdang bi kai tamen, ni yingdang dengdai, tamen biding shi dengdai de.§
Xianzhi a! Ni yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, ni buyao shuncong bu xin zhe he wei xin zhe, zhenzhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi zhi rui de
Ni yingdang zunxun cong ni de zhu jiang shi ni de (jingdian), zhenzhu que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
Ni yingdang xintuo zhenzhu, zhenzhu zu wei jianhu zhe

Zhenzhu meiyou zai renhe ren de xiongtang li chuangzao liang ge xin. Nimen de qizi, nimen ba tamen de jibei dangzuo ziji de muqin de jibei ──zhenzhu meiyou ba tamen dangzuo nimen de muqin, ye meiyou ba nimen de yi zi dang zuo nimen de erzi. Zhe shi nimen xinkoukaihe dehua. Zhenzhu shi shuoming zhenli de, shi zhishi zhengdao de

Nimen yingdang yi tamen de fuqin de xingshi chenghu tamen, zai zhenzhu kan lai, zhe shi geng gongping de. Ruguo nimen bu zhidao tamen de fuqin shi shei, name, tamen shi nimen de jiao bao he qinyou. Nimen suo wu fan de shi, duiyu nimen meiyou zuiguo, nimen suo gu fan de shi, jiu buranle. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de

Xianzhi dui xinshimen de quanli, zhong yu tamen zishen de quanli, ta de zhong qi, shi tamen de muqin. Xueqin yu xueqin xianghu jian de quanli, yi zhenzhu de jingdian, shi zhong yu xinshi he qian shi di quanli de, chufei nimen dui ziji de qinyou xingshan. Zhe shi jilu zai tian jing li de
Dangri, wo yu zhong xianzhi ding yue, yu ni he nu ha, yi bo la xin, mu sa, mai er yan zhizi er sa ding yue, wo yu tamen ding zhuangyan de mengyue
yibian zhenzhu xiang chengshi zhe xunwen tamen de chengshi. Ta yi wei bu xindao zhe yubeile tongku de xingfa

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jiyi zhenzhu suo ci nimen de endian. Dangshi, di jun lai gong nimen, wo jiu dui tamen paiqian baofeng he nimen suo wei jian de tianbing. Zhenzhu shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de
Dangshi, tamen cong nimen de shangmian he nimen de xiamian lai gong nimen; dangshi, nimen yanhua xintiao, bing dui zhenzhu zuo zhongzhong caice
Zai na shi, xinshimen ceng shoudao kaoyan, bing shou julie de zhendong
Dangshi, wei xinzhe he xinzhong you bing de ren dou shuo:“Zhenzhu ji qi shizhe, zhi xuwei di ying xu women.”

Dangshi, tamen zhong de yipai ren shuo:“Ye si li bo ren a, nimen bubi zai zheli douliule. Nimen hui jia qu ba!” Tamen zhong de yipai ren, xiang xianzhi gaojia shuo:“Women de fangwu, que shi polan de.” Qishi tamen de fangwu bing bushi polan de, tamen yao xiang taozou
Jiaruo zhe zuo chengshi bei diren cong ge fangmian gongpo, erhou di jun yaoqiu tamen pan jiao, tamen biding chengnuo. Tamen yin ci shi zhi dan yan pianke
Yiqian tamen yu zhenzhu que yi yueding, tamen jue bu zhuan bei. Zhenzhu de mengyue, shi yinggai fuze luxing de
Ni shuo:“Ruguo nimen taobi siwang, huo shalu, name, taobi duiyu nimen jue wu biyi. Nimen jishi taobi, ye zhi dedao shaoshao xiangshou.”

Ni shuo:“Ruguo zhenzhu yu jiang huo yu nimen, shei neng fankang zhenzhu er baohu nimen ne? Ruguo ta yu jiang fu yu nimen,(shei neng ganshe ta) ne?” Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe he renhe yuanzhu zhe.§
Zhenzhu zhidao nimen zhong youxie ren zu'ai bieren, bingqie dui tamen de tongbao shuo:“Nimen dao women zhe bian lai ba!” Tamen zhi ou'er canzhan

Tamen dui nimen shi linse de. Dang kongbu jianglin de shihou, ni jian tamen wangzhe ni, tamen de yanjing zhuandong de xiang hun si de ren yiyang; dang kongbu xiaoshi de shihou, tamen que yi jianli de koushe tong ma nimen, er tamen dui qiancai shi linse de. Zhe deng ren, meiyou xindao, gu zhenzhu jieshi tamen de xingwei de xuwei, zhe duiyu zhenzhu shi rongyi de

Tamen yiwei tongmeng jun hai meiyou chetui, ruguo tongmeng jun juantuchonglai, tamen jiang xiwang ziji zai shamo zhong de youmu de alabo ren zhongjian, bing cong nali tanting nimen de xiaoxi, jiaruo tamen yu nimen xiangchu, tamen zhi ou'er canjia zhandou
Xiwang zhenzhu he mori, bingqie duoduo jinian zhenzhu zhe, nimen you shizhe keyi zuo tamen de youliang mofan

Dang xinshi jian tongmeng jun de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi zhenzhu ji qi shizhe suo yingxu women de, zhenzhu ji qi shizhe shuo duile.” Zhe jian shi zhi neng shi tamen gengjia quexin, gengjia shuncong
Xinshi zhong you xuduo ren, yi shijian tamen yu zhenzhu suo ding de mengyue: Tamen zhong you chengren de, youdai yi de, tamen meiyou bianjie
Yibian zhenzhuyin chengshi zhe de chengshi er shan bao tamen, bingqie suiyi di chengfa wei xinzhe, huo she you tamen. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Zhenzhu shi bu xindao zhe wei neng huosheng, fenfen er gui; zhenzhu shi xinshi bu zhan er sheng. Zhenzhu shi zhi gang de, shi wanneng de
Ta ceng shi fuzhu tamen di naxie xinfeng tian jing zhe, cong ziji de baolei shang xialai, bingqie ba kongbu tou zai tamen xinli, nimen shalu yibufen, fulu yibufen
Ta shi nimen jicheng tamen de tudi, fangwu, caichan he nimen shangwei taguo de tudi. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Xianzhi a! Ni dui ni de zhong qi shuo:“Ruguo nimen yu de jinshi de shenghuo yuqi zhuangshi, name, nimen lai ba! Wo jiang yi li yi kuizeng nimen, wo ren nimen yi li er li qu
Ruguo nimen yu de zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de xiyue, yu houshi de anzhai, name zhenzhu que yi wei nimen zhong de xingshan zhe, yubeile zhongda de baochou.”
Xianzhi de qizimen a! Nimen zhong shei zuole mingxian de choushi zhe, jiang shou jiabei de xingfa, zhe shi duiyu zhenzhu shi rongyi de
Nimen zhong shei fucong zhenzhu ji qi shizhe, erqie xingshan, wo jiang jiabei baochou shei, wo yi wei ta yubeile youhou de jiyang
Xianzhi de qizimen a! Nimen bu xiang bie de renhe funu, ruguo nimen jingwei zhenzhu, jiu buyao shuo wenrou dehua, yimian xinzhong you bing de ren, tanlian nimen; nimen yingdang shuo zhuangzhong dehua

Nimen yingdang anju yu nimen de jiazhong, nimen buyao xuan lu nimen di meili, ru congqian mengmei shidai de funu nayang. Nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, shuncong zhenzhu ji qi shizhe. Xianzhi de jiashu a! Zhenzhu zhi yu xiaochu nimen de wuhui, xi jing nimen de zui'e
Nimen yingdang jin ji zai nimen jiazhong suo xuandu de zhenzhu de jixiang he geyan, zhen zhu shi xuanmiao de, shi che zhi de

Shunfu de nannu, xindao de nannu, fucong de nannu, chengshi de nannu, jianren de nannu, gongjing de nannu, hao shi de nannu, zhaijie de nannu, baoshou zhencao de nannu, chang nian zhenzhu de nannu, zhenzhu yi wei tamen yubeile she youhe zhongda de baochou
Dangzhenzhu ji qi shizhe panjue yi jian shi de shihou, xindao de nannu duiyu tamen de shi, buyi you xuanze. Shei weikang zhenzhu ji qi shizhe, shei yi xianru xianzhu de mi wule

Dangshi, ni dui na zhenzhu ceng shi yi enhui, ni ye ceng shi yi enhui de ren shuo:“Ni yingdang wanliu ni de qizi, ni yingdang jingwei zhenzhu.” Ni ba zhenzhu suo yu zhaoshi de, yincang zai ni de xinzhong, zhenzhu shi geng yingdang wei ni suo weiju de, ni que weiju zhongren. Dang zai de li jue ta de shihou, wo yi ta wei ni de qizi, yimian xinshimen wei tamen de yi zi suo li jue de qizi er ganjue fannan. Zhenzhu de mingling shi bixu fengxing de
Xianzhi duiyu zhenzhu suo xu ta de shi, buyi ganjue fannan. Zhenzhu ceng yi ci wei guren de changdao. Zhenzhu de mingling shi buke biangeng de ding'an
Xianzhimen shi chuanda zhenzhu de shiming de, tamen weiju ta, chu zhenzhu wai, tamen bu weiju renhe ren. Zhenzhu zu wei jiancha zhe
Muhanmode bushi nimen zhong renhe nanren de fuqin, er shi zhenzhu de shizhe he zhong xianzhi de fengyin. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi wanwu de
Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang changchang jinian zhenzhu
nimen yingdang chao xi zansong ta chaojue wanwu
Ta lianmin nimen, ta de tianshenmen wei nimen qidao, yibian ta jiang nimen cong chongchong hei'an yinru guangming, ta shi lianmin xinshi di
Tamen yu zhenzhu huijian di neitian, zhenzhu dui tamen de zhuci shi shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an.” Ta yi wei tamen yubeile youhou de baochou
Xianzhi a! Wo que yi paiqian ni wei jianzheng zhe, wei baoxi zhe, wei jinggao zhe
wei feng zhenzhu zhi ming er zhao ren yu zhenzhu zhe, wei canlan de mingdeng
Ni yingdang xiang xinshimen baoxi, tamen jiang huode cong zhenzhu jiangxia de hong en
Ni buyao shuncong buxinzhe he wei xin zhe, ni yingdang ren sui tamen ruma, ni yingdang xinren zhenzhu, zhenzhu zu wei jianhu zhe

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen ruo qu xindao de funu, ranhou zai jiaojie qian xiule tamen, name, tamen bu gai wei nimen er shou xianqi, suoyi nimen yingdang shi tamen xiangshou, yingdang rang tamen yi li er li qu

Xianzhi a! Wo que yi zhun ni xiangshou ni jiyu pinli de qizi, ni de nubi, ji zhenzhu yiwei ni de zhanlipin de, ni de cong fu de nu'er, ni de gumu de nu'er, ni de jiufu de nu'er, ni de yimu de nu'er, tamen shi tong ni yidao qianju de. Xindao de funu, ruo jiang zishen zengyu xianzhi, ruo xianzhi yuanyi qu ta, zhe shi texu ni de, xinshimen bude yuanli ──wo zhidao wo wei tamen de qizi yu nubi er dui tamen zuo chu de guiding ──yimian ni ganshou kunnan. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.§

Ni keyi renyi di li jue tamen zhong de renhe ren, ye keyi renyi di wanliu tamen zhong de renhe ren. Ni suo zan li de qizi, ni xiang zhaohui ta, duiyu ni shi hao wu zuiguo de. Na shi zuijin yu shi tamen gandao anwei er wu bei'ai de, bingqie dou manyi ni suo jiyu tamen de. Zhenzhu zhidao nimen de xinshi, zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Yihou bu zhun ni zai qu funu, ye bu zhun ni yi tamen huan diao bie de qizi, jishi ni xianmu tamen di meimao, chufei shi ni de nubi. Zhenzhu shi jianshi wanwu de

Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao jin xianzhi de jia, chufei yaoqing nimen qu chifan de shihou; nimen buyao jinqu deng fan shu, dao zhao nimen qu de shihou cai jinqu; ji chi zhihou jiu dang gaotui, buyao liulian xianhua, yinwei na hui shi xianzhi gandao nanweiqing de, dan ta bu haoyisi citui nimen. Zhenzhu shi bu chi yu jieshi zhenli de. Nimen xiang xianzhi de qizimen suoqu renhe wupin de shihou, yingdang zai weimu wai suoqu, na duiyu nimen de xin he tamen de xin shi geng qingbai de. Nimen buyi shi zhenzhu de shizhe nanweiqing, zai ta zhihou, yong buyi qu ta de qizi, yinwei zai zhenzhu kan lai, na shi yi jian dazui
Ruguo nimen xian lou yi jian shi, huo yinni ta,(zhenzhu zong shi zhidao de), yin wei zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanwu de
Tamen wufang huijian tamen de fuqin, erzi, dixiong, zhizi, waisheng, xindao de funu, he ziji de nubi. Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi jianzheng wanwu de
Zhenzhu dique lianmin xianzhi, ta de tianshenmen dique wei ta zhufu. Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang wei ta zhufu, yingdang zhu ta ping'an
Feibang zhenzhu he shizhe de ren, zhen zhu zai jinshi he houshi bi qi jue tamen, bing wei tamen yubei lingru de xingfa
Yi xinshimen hexin numen suo wei fan de zui'e feibang tamen zhe, que yi danfu wumie he mingxian de zui'e

Xianzhi a! Ni yingdang dui ni de qizi, ni de nu'er he xinshimen de funu shuo:“Jiao tamen yingdang yong waiyi mengzhe ziji de shenti.” Zheyang zuo zui rongyi shi ren renshi tamen, er bu shou qinfan. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.§
Wei xin de, xinzhong you bing de, zai chengzhong shanhuo renxin de, ruguo tamen reng bu baxiu, wo bi ming ni zhicai tamen, tamen jiu bude jiuju chengzhong yu ni wei linle
Tamen jiang bei qi jue, wulun tamen zai nali pi fa xian, jiu zai nali bei daibu, er bei chusi
Zhe shi zhenzhu duiyu guren de changdao, duiyu zhenzhu de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian renhe biangeng
Zhongren wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou? Ni shuo:“Na zhiyou zhenzhu cai zhidao.” Shenme shi ni zhidao ta he shi fasheng ne? Fuhuo shi, huoxu shi hen jin de
Zhenzhu que yi qi jue buxindao zhe, bing wei tamen yubei liehuo
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, buneng dedao renhe baohu zhe, ye buneng dedao renhe yuanzhu zhe
Tamen de mianpi zai huo zhong bei fanzhuan zhi ri, tamen jiang shuo:“Dan yuan women ceng fucong zhenzhu, fucong shizhe!”
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women que yi fucong women de lingxiu he women de weiren, er tamen shi women weibei zhengdao
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yong jiabei de xingfa chuzhi tamen, qiu ni yanli de qi jue tamen.”
Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao fangxiao yuan wu mu sa de renmen. Zhenzhu yi wei ta xi xueyuan wu, ju zhenzhu kan lai, ta shi you mianzi de
Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang shuo zheng hua
Ta jiu gaishan nimen de xingwei, jiu she you nimen de zuiguo. Fucong zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de ren, que yi huode weida de chenggong
Wo que yi jiang zhongren xintuo tiandi he shanyue, dan tamen bu ken chengdan ta, tamen weiju ta, er ren que chengdanle ta ──ren que shi bu yi de, que shi wuzhi de
yizhi zhenzhu chengfa wei xin de nannu he yi wu pei zhu de nannu, er she you xindao de nannu! Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Houshi de zansong, zhi guiyu ta. Ta shi zhi rui de, shi che zhi de
Ta zhidao qianru dixia de, cong dixia fachu de, cong tianshang jiangxia de, sheng dao tianshang de. Ta shi zhi ci de, shi zhi she de
